title: SPLASH
description: A 90-minute Campus-level coding competition wherein participants are given a problem set to solve in their preferred programming language and get an opportunity to show up their programming skills.

title: GameHub 2.O
description: Bored of playing the same old games? Have you ever thought of creating your own game? Here is an opportunity to expose your creative skills and simulate all your boundless imagination Scope club is back with another spectacular event GameHub-2.0.A 3-Day-Hackathon which includes Bootcamp, guidance from experts and a cherishing environment for sure.So, what are you waiting for, Awaken your inner developer and create your own game based on limitless themes.

title: Modifest
description: SCOPE Club is back again to provide you an oppurtunity to explore the most popular domains WEB and APP Development with modifest

title: CBUG Contest
description: 7 days Online contest in which Winner will get Amazon Gift Voucher And Some Well participated Participents will get Udemy course

title: Codewars
description: A Coding Contest on Coding Ninjas platform.
